TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDatabaseOperations

Docs.summary: Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Databases. Contains operations to: Create, Retrieve, Update, and Delete databases, and also includes the ability to get the event logs for a database.
